Title: TC.Chart
Description:
TC.Chart is a powerful Silverlight chart project. Charts in it is fully templatable, so you can change template with your personal one by Expression Blend without any coding. 
Designers do their design, developers do their coding, cooperation is so simple! Life is so simple!
